work.name: Voco
work.summary: Experienced software engineer with a strong background in designing scalable microservices architecture and mentoring other developers. Proven track record of collaborating on high-impact projects, including streamlining financial reporting and implementing the Voco System Architecture. Skilled in utilizing AWS Services, MongoDB, Google Services, and Nest.js to deliver robust and efficient solutions. Adept at leading teams and driving innovation in dynamic environments.
highlights: Collaborated for high-impact projects with Voco Team.
Designed Voco System Architecture and implemented it. Used AWS Services ,MongoDB,Google Services and Nest.js for this project.

work.name: HoloNext
work.summary:
In this role, I specialized in developing and implementing advanced AR/VR applications utilizing a diverse set of technologies. Key responsibilities included:

Developing immersive AR/VR experiences using Three.js and Babylon.js, leveraging their capabilities to create high-quality 3D visualizations and interactions.
Integrating ChatGPT APIs to enhance the interactivity and intelligence of AR/VR applications, providing a more engaging user experience.
Utilizing Node.js for server-side scripting, ensuring efficient and scalable backend processes.
Implementing Azure Storage solutions to manage and store large volumes of data securely and efficiently.
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to design and execute projects, ensuring all deliverables met client specifications and were completed on time.
Continuously researching and incorporating the latest AR/VR trends and technologies to keep the applications cutting-edge and competitive.
This experience allowed me to deepen my technical expertise and contribute to innovative projects that push the boundaries of what's possible in AR/VR technology.
highlights: Designed AR and VR Tools with Javascript and Three.js

work.name: Enhencer
work.summary: , I developed and maintained modern web applications utilizing Google Tag Manager, MongoDB, Node.js, and Express technologies. I collaborated with cross-functional teams to create user-centric solutions and regularly participated in code reviews and testing throughout the process. These experiences have significantly enhanced both my technical skills and my ability to work effectively within a team
highlights: Participated in code reviews and testing.
